properties.title: Red River Gorge
properties.description: This was one of the best trips I have ever been on. Complete with rain, snakes, Ale-8-One and so much amazing...nature!

properties.title: Cooper's Rock
properties.description: I almost proposed to you out on this rock. Maybe I got cold feet then, but wasn't it worth the wait!

properties.title: Shawnee Backpack Trail
properties.description: You did not want to go on this three day hike as it was hot, you were pregnant, and the 1970s backpack was not a comfotable fit. Stil, I do have some fond memories. Most memorable to me were the howling screech owls in the middle of the second night and the overlook on the final day.
